question: Which of the following is the process by which living organisms obtain energy from food?
What is the process by which green plants make food using sunlight?
Which of the following is the primary pigment involved in photosynthesis?
What is the waste product of respiration in humans?
Which of the following is the process by which plants lose water through their leaves?
What is the process by which food is broken down into simpler substances in the body?
Which of the following is the main site of digestion and absorption of food in the human body?
What is the process by which nutrients are taken up by cells and used for energy, growth, and repair?
Which of the following is the process of removal of waste products from the body?
What is the primary excretory organ in humans?
Which of the following is the process by which substances are transported to different parts of the body?
What is the main component of blood responsible for carrying oxygen to the body tissues?
Which of the following is the process of the breakdown of glucose to release energy in the absence of oxygen?
What is the process by which organisms release energy from food using oxygen?
Which of the following is the process of the exchange of gases between the respiratory system and the environment?
What is the main organ of the respiratory system in humans?
Which of the following is the process of the breakdown of complex substances into simpler ones in the body?
What is the process by which complex substances are synthesized from simpler ones in the body?
Which of the following is the sum total of all the chemical reactions occurring in the cells of an organism?
What is the process by which plants and animals exchange gases with their surroundings?
Which of the following is the process of the breakdown of food into simpler substances outside the body?
What is the process by which nutrients are absorbed into the bloodstream from the digestive system?
Which of the following is the process by which plants take in water and minerals from the soil?
What is the process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy?
Which of the following is the process of the removal of excess water and waste products from the body of an organism?
What is the primary excretory organ in plants?
Which of the following is the process by which plants release water vapor into the atmosphere?
What is the process by which waste materials are eliminated from the body in the form of urine?
Which of the following is the process by which substances are transported through the plant body?
What is the process by which plants bend or turn towards a source of light?
